Posts.Content: Nov 28, 2011 04:17PM Frustrated_Canadian wrote: ThisTooShallPass, Thank you for responding.  I think I am at peace with everything, I honestly just want to move on to my reconstruction phase.  I was going to get reconstruction prior to finding the lumps in the left breast, 4 months ago, but due to the lumps (cysts) we thought it better to do a mastectomy, with reconstruction at the same time.  My plastic surgeon was not comfortable with that, as my past history with infection, so we are doing the mastectomy, with reconstruction 6 weeks later.

Posts.Content: Apr 8, 2011 07:49AM Frustrated_Canadian wrote: I had a mastectomy without reconstruction, on a Wednesday, and by Friday I was able to type.  I didn't have the stamina that I normally have, but was working from home on Friday, for a few hours at a time.  One week out I was back at work 1/2 days. I say just listen to your body, it  will tell you when you have had enough!
